text: Gustavo Florentin (born 30 June 1978 in Paraguay) is a Paraguayan football manager who now works as head coach of C.D. Huachipato in Chile.Gustavo Florentín es el nuevo técnico de Huachipato RedGol ==Career== Florentin started his managerial career with Cerro Porteño. After that, he coached Deportivo Capiatá, Sportivo Luqueño, and Club Guaraní. In 2019, he was appointed head coach of C.D. Huachipato in the Chilean Primera División, a position he currently holds. == References == == External links == * Florentín: "In Paraguay they are very resultista" * Gustavo Florentín: "We must make a dynamic and intense football" * Gustavo Florentín's confession * Gustavo Florentín's conclusions: «The players interpreted us as a coaching staff» Category:Paraguayan football managers Category:1978 births Category:Living people
title: Gustavo Florentín
